content: Anatole has been gracious enough to review this very thoroughly, but he has also contributed to it a lot, so we agreed it would be good to have another set of eyes. My apologies that the diff is ugly; the PR which added this file was merged before things had completely solidified due to a miscommunication on my part.

the PR which added this file was merged before things had completely solidified

Which PR was that? Can you mention it in the PR description?
Perhaps it makes sense to revert the other PR in master first, to make the diff simpler?
Your choice: #6717 reverts if you want to merge it.
@Eric Wieser #6372 now has a clean diff against master.
